resource_data:

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2896</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2896</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Clothes</string>
            <string language="en">Clothes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vêtements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roupa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vestiti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδύματα</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva que treballa el vocabulari de peces de roba i la descripció de roba, en persones, associada als colors. Gramaticalment destaca la posició del nom del color davant de la peça de roba, així com l'ús dels indeterminats "a", "an" en paraules en singular. Inclou activitats interactives d'observació, identificació i comprensió.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the vocabulary of clothes, the description of what a person is wearing, including colours. Grammatically, work is centred on the position of the colour before the name of the garment, as well as the use of the indefinite articles "a" and "an" in the singular. It includes interactive exercises on observation, identification and comprehension.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vestits</string>
            <string language="en">clothing</string>
            <string language="es">vestidos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">color</string>
            <string language="en">colour</string>
            <string language="es">color</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Wortschatz von Kleidung, die Beschreibung von eine 
welcher Person trägt, einschließlich Farben. Grammatisch wird 
Arbeit auf der Position der Farbe vor dem Namen des Kleides zentriert,
sowie den Gebrauch von den unbestimmten Artikeln "a" und "" in der 
Eigenheit. Sie schließt interaktive Übungen auf Beobachtung, 
Kennzeichen und Erfassen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
le vocabulaire des vêtements, la description quelle personne porte, y
compris des couleurs. Grammaticalement, le travail est porté 
sur la position de la couleur avant le nom du vêtement, aussi bien 
que l'utilisation des articles indéfinis "a" et "" dans le singulier.
Il inclut des exercices interactifs sur l'observation, 
l'identification et la compréhension.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no 
vocabulário da roupa, a descrição do que pessoa está desgastando, 
including cores. Gramaticalmente, o trabalho é centrado na 
posição da cor antes do nome do garment, as.well.as o uso dos 
artigos indefinidos "a" e "" no singular. Inclui exercícios 
interativos na observação, na identificação e na compreensão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sul 
vocabolario dei vestiti, la descrizione del ché persona sta portando,
compreso i colori. Grammaticale, il lavoro è concentrato sulla 
posizione del colore prima del nome dell'indumento, così come l'uso 
degli articoli indefiniti "a" e "" nel singolare. Include le 
esercitazioni interattive sull'osservazione, sull'identificazione e 
sulla comprensione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στο 
λεξιλόγιο των ενδυμάτων, η περιγραφή αυτού που ένα πρόσωπο 
φορά, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των χρωμάτων. Γραμματικά, η 
εργασία είναι κεντροθετημένη στη θέση του χρώματος πριν από το 
όνομα του ενδύματος, καθώς επίσης και τη χρήση των αόριστων 
άρθρων "α" και "" στον ενικό αριθμό. Περιλαμβάνει τις 
διαλογικές ασκήσεις στην παρατήρηση, τον προσδιορισμό και την 
κατανόηση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleidung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
